title.narrative: Laying the foundations for sustainable peace in Burkina Faso: Proposal for a participatory analysis of drivers of conflict and resilience factors

description.narrative: Description: Implement a process through which the population of Burkina Faso can openly express, in their own terms, how they understand the current threats to peace and security in their country and how they are addressing these challenges, with a view to designing programmes and policies to sustain peace in the long term.
